queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{linkerd-default-tap-admin}}.rules[1].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{linkerd-default-tap-admin}}.rules[1].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tap-injector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tap-injector}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tap-injector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tap-injector}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tap}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tap}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tap}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tap}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{namespace-metadata}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{namespace-metadata}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{namespace-metadata}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{namespace-metadata}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{metrics-api}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{metrics-api}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{metrics-api}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{metrics-api}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{namespace-metadata}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{namespace-metadata}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{namespace-metadata}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{namespace-metadata}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{namespace-metadata}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{prometheus}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{tap-injector}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{web}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{metrics-api}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{tap}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=metrics-api has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=web has limits defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=prometheus has limits defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=tap has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=namespace-metadata has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=tap has limits defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=metrics-api has limits defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=web has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=prometheus has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=tap-injector has limits defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=tap-injector has resources defined

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=metrics-api.resources should have requests defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=tap-injector.resources should have requests defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=tap should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=web should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=web.resources should have requests defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=tap.resources should have requests defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=prometheus.resources should have requests defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=prometheus should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=tap-injector should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=namespace-metadata should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=metrics-api should have resources defined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{metrics-api}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{metrics-api}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{metrics-api}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{metrics-api}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tap-injector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tap-injector}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tap-injector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tap-injector}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{prometheus}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{prometheus}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{prometheus}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{prometheus}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tap}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tap}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tap}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tap}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{namespace-metadata}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{namespace-metadata}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{namespace-metadata}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{namespace-metadata}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{web}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{web}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{web}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{web}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{namespace-metadata}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{namespace-metadata}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{namespace-metadata}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{namespace-metadata}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tap-injector}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{tap-injector}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tap-injector}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{tap-injector}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{metrics-api}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{metrics-api}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{metrics-api}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{metrics-api}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{prometheus}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{prometheus}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{prometheus}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{prometheus}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tap}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{tap}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tap}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{tap}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{metrics-api}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{metrics-api}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tap-injector}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tap-injector}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{prometheus}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{prometheus}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{web}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{web}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tap}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tap}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{namespace-metadata}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{namespace-metadata}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tap}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{metrics-api}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{prometheus}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{web}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tap-injector}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tap-injector}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{namespace-metadata}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{namespace-metadata}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
